KPK Ungkap Imam Nahrawi Diduga Terima Uang di Rumah Taufik Hidayat
05 Nov 2019, 17:12 by Yulida Medistiara
Jakarta - KPK membeberkan uang yang diduga diterima Imam Nahrawi selama menjabat sebagai Menpora. KPK menyebut Imam Nahrawi menerima sejumlah uang dari sejumlah pengurus KONI.
"Sekitar akhir tahun 2017, sekitar Rp 1,5 miliar rupiah dari saudara Ending Fuad Hamidy atau Sekjen KONI. Akhir tahun 2017 sekitar Rp 1 miliar dari Satlak Prima yang diambil oleh saudara Miftahul Ulum di rumah saudara Taufik Hidayat," kata tim Biro Hukum KPK, Natalia Kristanto, saat membacakan jawaban atas permohonan praperadilan Imam Nahrawi di Pengadilan Negeri Jaksel, Jl Ampera Raya, Jakarta Selatan, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Selain itu, KPK mengatakan Imam Nahrawi diduga menerima uang dari mantan Sekretaris Menteri Pemuda dan Olahraga (Sesmenpora) Alfitra Salamm sebesar Rp 300 juta pada 6 Agustus 2015.
Uang itu disebut KPK atas permintaan Aspri Imam, Miftahul Ulum untuk kepentingan Imam Nahrawi pada acara muktamar salah satu ormas keagamaan.
"Bahwa penerimaan uang-uang tersebut diterima oleh Saudara Miftahul Ulum. Yang berdasarkan bukti-bukti yang ada, saksi-saksi, dokumen dan alat bukti lain yang disimpan secara elektorik. Saudara Miftahul Ulum adalah representasi dari saudara Imam," kata Natalia.
Selain itu, KPK menyebut Imam menerima uang dari Ending Fuad Hamidy pada tahun 2018 sebesar Rp 11,5 miliar. Uang tersebut merupakan commitmen fee atas proyek pengurusan sampai dengan pencairan proposal hibah yang diajukan KONI.
Pada tanggal 6 Agustus sejumlah Rp 400 juta dari saudara Chandra Bhakti dari pejabat pembuat komitmen dan saudara Supriyono selaku bendahara sebagai honor Imam Nahrawi sebagai Ketua Dewan Pengarah Satlak Prima di luar nilai kewajaran sebagaimana tercantum dalam standar biaya umum yang diatur Kemenkeu.
Selain itu, Imam juga menerima uang yang diduga untuk keperluan penanganan perkara adiknya.
"Sekitar November 2018 sejumlah Rp 7 miliar dari saudara Ending Fuad Hamidy selaku Sekjen KONI melalui saudara Lina Nurhasanah untuk penanganan perkara pidana yang sedang dihadapi oleh saudara Syamsul Arifin atau adik pemohon yang penanganannya dilakukan di salah satu instansi penegak hukum," kata Natalia.
"Tanggal 12 Januari 2017 sebesar Rp 800 juta rupiah diterima oleh saudara Taufik Hidayat untuk penanganan perkara pidana yang sedang dihadapi oleh Syamsul Arifin atau adik pemohon di penanganannya dilakukan di salah satu instansi penegak hukum," papar Natalia.
Tak hanya itu, Imam menurut KPK juga diduga menerima uang pada tahun 2016 dengan total Rp 4 miliar. Rinciannya Rp 2 miliar diterima melalui seorang PNS Kemenpora yang disetorkan ke kas negara sebagai pengganti kerugian keuangan negara terkait pemeriksaan BPK. Sekitar November 2016 Rp 2 miliar diterima saudara Evi Imamesa untuk memuluskan pengajuan anggaran olympic center di APBN-P 2016.
Imam ditetapkan KPK sebagai tersangka suap dana hibah KONI dan penerimaan lain berkaitan dengan jabatannya. Imam diduga menerima suap sebesar Rp 26,5 miliar secara bertahap sejak 2014-2018.
Uang yang diterima Imam diduga merupakan commitment fee atas pengurusan proposal hibah yang diajukan KONI ke Kemenpora, penerimaan terkait Ketua Dewan Pengarah Satlak Prima.

KPK Reveals Imam Nahrawi Allegedly Receives Money at Taufik Hidayat's House
05 Nov 2019, 17:12 by Yulida Medistiara
Jakarta - KPK revealed the money allegedly received by Imam Nahrawi while serving as Menpora. The KPK said Imam Nahrawi received some money from a number of KONI management.
"Around the end of 2017, around Rp 1.5 billion came from Ending Fuad Hamidy or the Secretary General of KONI. At the end of 2017, around Rp 1 billion from Satlak Prima was taken by Miftahul Ulum at Taufik Hidayat's house," said the KPK Legal Bureau team , Natalia Kristanto, while reading the answer to Imam Nahrawi's pretrial petition at the South Jakarta District Court, Jl Ampera Raya, South Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019).
In addition, the KPK said Imam Nahrawi allegedly received money from the former Secretary of the Minister of Youth and Sports (Sesmenpora) Alfitra Salamm for Rp. 300 million on August 6, 2015.
The money was called the KPK at the request of Aspri Imam, Miftahul Ulum for the benefit of Imam Nahrawi at a conference of religious organizations.
"That the receipt of the money was received by Brother Miftahul Ulum. Based on the available evidence, witnesses, documents and other evidence that was stored electronically. Brother Miftahul Ulum is a representation of Brother Imam," Natalia said.
In addition, the KPK said that Imam received money from Ending Fuad Hamidy in 2018 in the amount of Rp 11.5 billion. The money is a commitment fee for the management project until the disbursement of the grant proposal submitted by KONI.
On August 6, Rp. 400 million from Mr. Chandra Bhakti from the commitment-making official and Mr. Supriyono as treasurer as Imam Nahrawi's honor as Chairperson of the Satlak Prima Steering Board were outside the fairness value as stated in the general cost standards set by the Ministry of Finance.
In addition, the Imam also received money allegedly for handling his sister's case.
"Around November 2018 a total of Rp. 7 billion from Ending Fuad Hamidy as the Secretary General of KONI through brother Lina Nurhasanah for handling criminal cases being faced by brother Syamsul Arifin or the applicant's sister whose handling was carried out in one of the law enforcement agencies," said Natalia.
"On January 12, 2017 Rp. 800 million was received by brother Taufik Hidayat for handling criminal cases that were being faced by Syamsul Arifin or the applicant's younger brother in handling them in one of the law enforcement agencies," said Natalia.
Not only that, according to the KPK Imam also allegedly received money in 2016 with a total of Rp 4 billion. The details of Rp 2 billion were received through a civil servant from the Ministry of Youth and Sports which was deposited into the state treasury as a substitute for state financial losses related to BPK audits. Around November 2016 Rp. 2 billion was received by brother Evi Imamesa to smooth the submission of the Olympic Center budget in the 2016 APBN-P.
Imam was named by the KPK as a suspect in KONI's grants and other receipts related to his position. Imam is suspected of receiving bribes of Rp. 26.5 billion in stages since 2014-2018.
The money allegedly received by Imam was a commitment fee for the handling of the grant proposal submitted by KONI to the Ministry of Youth and Sports, the reception related to the Chairperson of the Satlak Prima Steering Board.
